attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the new laws on banning the use of mobile phones (without a hands free kit) whilst driving, along with penalties on eating & drinking, & also the possibility of banning smoking whilst driving; I thought it only right that Sneezing was added to the list !
I personally believe sneezing to top the list of dangerous acts, as you momentarily enter a world of relaxation & orgasmic pleasure.
Let's feel even more like prisoners in our own vehicles - let's STOMP OUT SNEEZING !!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
